titlestmt.subtitle: An inventory of his papers at Syracuse University
titlestmt.author: DRC

list.item: Feb 2009 - converted to EAD (MRC)

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.abstract: Correspondence, subject files and architectural plans for Henry projects and clients, such as Colby Junior College, Pine Manor, Boston, Philips Andover Academy, and the Nevada St. School in Newton, Massachusetts. Henry worked with landscape architect Guy Lowell.

bioghist.head: Biographical History
bioghist.p: Ralph Coolidge Henry was an American architect who worked primarily in New England. Henry worked with landscape architect Guy Lowell.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents of the Collection
scopecontent.p: The Ralph Coolidge Henry Papers consist of correspondence, subject files and architectural plans for Henry projects and clients, such as Colby Junior College, Pine Manor, Boston, Philips Andover Academy, and the Nevada St. School in Newton, Massachusetts.

arrangement.head: Arrangement of the Collection
arrangement.p: Collection remains in original order; inventory is a simple box list supplemented by an alphabetical list of projects created by &scrc_name; staff.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: &scrc_name; has the collections of a number of notable architects. Please refer to &subjindex; for a complete listing.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: The majority of our archival and manuscript collections are housed offsite and require advanced notice for retrieval. Researchers are encouraged to contact us in advance concerning the collection material they wish to access for their research.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Written permission must be obtained from SCRC and all relevant rights holders before publishing quotations, excerpts or images from any materials in this collection.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows:
